summary: Build a dark, creepy Hindi horror storytelling website named "Darr Ka Samna" with a black/red cinematic theme, featuring a blog/story system with category-wise browsing, post/article reading pages (Hindi font support), homepage latest stories, search, comments, night mode reading, mobile-friendly layout, share buttons, related posts section, thumbnail image placeholders, and ad/affiliate placement areas; seed the site with the first story "काली फाड़ी की चीखें" (Indian Horror); email subscribe box removed.
architectural_notes: Email subscribe box removed completely (no email subscription feature).
known_issues: Deployment/build failed during deployment attempt; user requested automatic retry and error fix.

existing_features.title: Create the core site structure for the horror storytelling website named "Darr Ka Samna" with a consistent dark, mysterious, creepy, cinematic visual theme using a black and deep-red palette and a scary/creepy headline font style while keeping body text highly readable.
Implement a homepage that lists the latest horror stories with story cards (title, short excerpt/preview, category label, and a link to the full story).
Implement category pages for: Indian Horror, Haunted Places, True Stories, Psychological Horror, each showing stories filtered by that category.
Implement an individual story reading page that displays the full story content with a comfortable reading layout and supports a "Night mode" reading toggle for the reading experience.
Add a site-wide story search bar that allows users to search stories by title (and optionally excerpt/content) and shows matching results.
Add a comment section on individual story pages that allows authenticated users (Internet Identity) to post comments and all users to read comments.
Provide dedicated UI placeholders/slots for Google AdSense ads and dedicated sections for Amazon affiliate links, without integrating any external ad/affiliate APIs.
Remove the email subscribe box completely from the product: do not display a subscribe UI, do not store emails, and do not expose any subscription-related actions/endpoints.
Add robust Hindi (Devanagari) font support across the site, ensuring Hindi story titles/content render correctly while keeping the existing horror heading font for English headings.
Add a story thumbnail image placeholder to story listing cards and the full story reading page, using a generated static placeholder image asset.
Add share buttons on the story reading page that allow users to share the current story URL via common share targets, without any external API integrations.
Add a related posts section on the story reading page that shows other stories from the same category, excluding the currently viewed story.
Identify the root cause of the current deployment/build failure and apply code/config changes required so the project builds and deploys successfully when retried.
